00027 /* Peripheral group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00032 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00033 #include "lpc17xx_rtc.h"
00034 #include "lpc17xx_clkpwr.h"

00036 
00037 /* If this source file built with example, the LPC17xx FW library configuration
00038  * file in each example directory ("lpc17xx_libcfg.h") must be included,
00039  * otherwise the default FW library configuration file must be included instead
00040  */
00041 #ifdef __BUILD_WITH_EXAMPLE__
00042 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00043 #else
00044 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg_default.h"

00050 /* Public Functions ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00055 /********************************************************************/
00060 void RTC_Init (LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx)
00061 {
00062         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00063 
00064         /* Set up clock and power for RTC module */
00065         CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCRTC, ENABLE);
00066 
00067         // Clear all register to be default
00068         RTCx->ILR = 0x00;
00069         RTCx->CCR = 0x00;
00070         RTCx->CIIR = 0x00;
00071         RTCx->AMR = 0xFF;
00072         RTCx->CALIBRATION = 0x00;
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 /*********************************************************************/
00082 void RTC_DeInit(LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx)
00083 {
00084         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00085 
00086         RTCx->CCR = 0x00;
00087         // Disable power and clock for RTC module
00088         CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCRTC, DISABLE);
00089 }
00090 
00091 /*********************************************************************/
00096 void RTC_ResetClockTickCounter(LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx)
00097 {
00098         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00099 
00100         RTCx->CCR |= RTC_CCR_CTCRST;
00101         RTCx->CCR &= (~RTC_CCR_CTCRST) & RTC_CCR_BITMASK;
00102 }
00103 
00104 /*********************************************************************/
00112 void RTC_Cmd (LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, FunctionalState NewState)
00113 {
00114         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00115         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
00116 
00117         if (NewState == ENABLE)
00118         {
00119                 RTCx->CCR |= RTC_CCR_CLKEN;
00120         }
00121         else
00122         {
00123                 RTCx->CCR &= (~RTC_CCR_CLKEN) & RTC_CCR_BITMASK;
00124         }
00125 }

00128 /*********************************************************************/
00150 void RTC_CntIncrIntConfig (LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, uint32_t CntIncrIntType, \
00151                                                                 FunctionalState NewState)
00152 {
00153         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00154         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
00155         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTC_TIMETYPE(CntIncrIntType));
00156 
00157         if (NewState ==  ENABLE)
00158         {
00159                 switch (CntIncrIntType)
00160                 {
00161                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_SECOND:
00162                         RTCx->CIIR |= RTC_CIIR_IMSEC;
00163                         break;
00164                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_MINUTE:
00165                         RTCx->CIIR |= RTC_CIIR_IMMIN;
00166                         break;
00167                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_HOUR:
00168                         RTCx->CIIR |= RTC_CIIR_IMHOUR;
00169                         break;
00170                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFWEEK:
00171                         RTCx->CIIR |= RTC_CIIR_IMDOW;
00172                         break;
00173                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFMONTH:
00174                         RTCx->CIIR |= RTC_CIIR_IMDOM;
00175                         break;
00176                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFYEAR:
00177                         RTCx->CIIR |= RTC_CIIR_IMDOY;
00178                         break;
00179                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_MONTH:
00180                         RTCx->CIIR |= RTC_CIIR_IMMON;
00181                         break;
00182                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_YEAR:
00183                         RTCx->CIIR |= RTC_CIIR_IMYEAR;
00184                         break;
00185                 }
00186         }
00187         else
00188         {
00189                 switch (CntIncrIntType)
00190                 {
00191                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_SECOND:
00192                         RTCx->CIIR &= (~RTC_CIIR_IMSEC) & RTC_CIIR_BITMASK;
00193                         break;
00194                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_MINUTE:
00195                         RTCx->CIIR &= (~RTC_CIIR_IMMIN) & RTC_CIIR_BITMASK;
00196                         break;
00197                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_HOUR:
00198                         RTCx->CIIR &= (~RTC_CIIR_IMHOUR) & RTC_CIIR_BITMASK;
00199                         break;
00200                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFWEEK:
00201                         RTCx->CIIR &= (~RTC_CIIR_IMDOW) & RTC_CIIR_BITMASK;
00202                         break;
00203                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFMONTH:
00204                         RTCx->CIIR &= (~RTC_CIIR_IMDOM) & RTC_CIIR_BITMASK;
00205                         break;
00206                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFYEAR:
00207                         RTCx->CIIR &= (~RTC_CIIR_IMDOY) & RTC_CIIR_BITMASK;
00208                         break;
00209                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_MONTH:
00210                         RTCx->CIIR &= (~RTC_CIIR_IMMON) & RTC_CIIR_BITMASK;
00211                         break;
00212                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_YEAR:
00213                         RTCx->CIIR &= (~RTC_CIIR_IMYEAR) & RTC_CIIR_BITMASK;
00214                         break;
00215                 }
00216         }
00217 }

00220 /*********************************************************************/
00242 void RTC_AlarmIntConfig (LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, uint32_t AlarmTimeType, \
00243                                                                 FunctionalState NewState)
00244 {
00245         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00246         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
00247         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTC_TIMETYPE(AlarmTimeType));
00248 
00249         if (NewState == ENABLE)
00250         {
00251                 switch (AlarmTimeType)
00252                 {
00253                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_SECOND:
00254                         RTCx->AMR &= (~RTC_AMR_AMRSEC) & RTC_AMR_BITMASK;
00255                         break;
00256                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_MINUTE:
00257                         RTCx->AMR &= (~RTC_AMR_AMRMIN) & RTC_AMR_BITMASK;
00258                         break;
00259                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_HOUR:
00260                         RTCx->AMR &= (~RTC_AMR_AMRHOUR) & RTC_AMR_BITMASK;
00261                         break;
00262                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFWEEK:
00263                         RTCx->AMR &= (~RTC_AMR_AMRDOW) & RTC_AMR_BITMASK;
00264                         break;
00265                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFMONTH:
00266                         RTCx->AMR &= (~RTC_AMR_AMRDOM) & RTC_AMR_BITMASK;
00267                         break;
00268                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFYEAR:
00269                         RTCx->AMR &= (~RTC_AMR_AMRDOY) & RTC_AMR_BITMASK;
00270                         break;
00271                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_MONTH:
00272                         RTCx->AMR &= (~RTC_AMR_AMRMON) & RTC_AMR_BITMASK;
00273                         break;
00274                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_YEAR:
00275                         RTCx->AMR &= (~RTC_AMR_AMRYEAR) & RTC_AMR_BITMASK;
00276                         break;
00277                 }
00278         }
00279         else
00280         {
00281                 switch (AlarmTimeType)
00282                 {
00283                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_SECOND:
00284                         RTCx->AMR |= (RTC_AMR_AMRSEC);
00285                         break;
00286                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_MINUTE:
00287                         RTCx->AMR |= (RTC_AMR_AMRMIN);
00288                         break;
00289                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_HOUR:
00290                         RTCx->AMR |= (RTC_AMR_AMRHOUR);
00291                         break;
00292                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFWEEK:
00293                         RTCx->AMR |= (RTC_AMR_AMRDOW);
00294                         break;
00295                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFMONTH:
00296                         RTCx->AMR |= (RTC_AMR_AMRDOM);
00297                         break;
00298                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFYEAR:
00299                         RTCx->AMR |= (RTC_AMR_AMRDOY);
00300                         break;
00301                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_MONTH:
00302                         RTCx->AMR |= (RTC_AMR_AMRMON);
00303                         break;
00304                 case RTC_TIMETYPE_YEAR:
00305                         RTCx->AMR |= (RTC_AMR_AMRYEAR);
00306                         break;
00307                 }
00308         }
00309 }

00312 /*********************************************************************/
00327 void RTC_SetTime (LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, uint32_t Timetype, uint32_t TimeValue)
00328 {
00329         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00330         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTC_TIMETYPE(Timetype));
00331 
00332         switch ( Timetype)
00333         {
00334         case RTC_TIMETYPE_SECOND:
00335                 CHECK_PARAM(TimeValue <= RTC_SECOND_MAX);
00336 
00337                 RTCx->SEC = TimeValue & RTC_SEC_MASK;
00338                 break;
00339 
00340         case RTC_TIMETYPE_MINUTE:
00341                 CHECK_PARAM(TimeValue <= RTC_MINUTE_MAX);
00342 
00343                 RTCx->MIN = TimeValue & RTC_MIN_MASK;
00344                 break;
00345 
00346         case RTC_TIMETYPE_HOUR:
00347                 CHECK_PARAM(TimeValue <= RTC_HOUR_MAX);
00348 
00349                 RTCx->HOUR = TimeValue & RTC_HOUR_MASK;
00350                 break;
00351 
00352         case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFWEEK:
00353                 CHECK_PARAM(TimeValue <= RTC_DAYOFWEEK_MAX);
00354 
00355                 RTCx->DOW = TimeValue & RTC_DOW_MASK;
00356                 break;
00357 
00358         case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFMONTH:
00359                 CHECK_PARAM((TimeValue <= RTC_DAYOFMONTH_MAX) \
00360                                 && (TimeValue >= RTC_DAYOFMONTH_MIN));
00361 
00362                 RTCx->DOM = TimeValue & RTC_DOM_MASK;
00363                 break;
00364 
00365         case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFYEAR:
00366                 CHECK_PARAM((TimeValue >= RTC_DAYOFYEAR_MIN) \
00367                                 && (TimeValue <= RTC_DAYOFYEAR_MAX));
00368 
00369                 RTCx->DOY = TimeValue & RTC_DOY_MASK;
00370                 break;
00371 
00372         case RTC_TIMETYPE_MONTH:
00373                 CHECK_PARAM((TimeValue >= RTC_MONTH_MIN) \
00374                                 && (TimeValue <= RTC_MONTH_MAX));
00375 
00376                 RTCx->MONTH = TimeValue & RTC_MONTH_MASK;
00377                 break;
00378 
00379         case RTC_TIMETYPE_YEAR:
00380                 CHECK_PARAM(TimeValue <= RTC_YEAR_MAX);
00381 
00382                 RTCx->YEAR = TimeValue & RTC_YEAR_MASK;
00383                 break;
00384         }
00385 }

00387 /*********************************************************************/
00401 uint32_t RTC_GetTime(LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, uint32_t Timetype)
00402 {
00403         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00404         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTC_TIMETYPE(Timetype));
00405 
00406         switch (Timetype)
00407         {
00408         case RTC_TIMETYPE_SECOND:
00409                 return (RTCx->SEC & RTC_SEC_MASK);
00410         case RTC_TIMETYPE_MINUTE:
00411                 return (RTCx->MIN & RTC_MIN_MASK);
00412         case RTC_TIMETYPE_HOUR:
00413                 return (RTCx->HOUR & RTC_HOUR_MASK);
00414         case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFWEEK:
00415                 return (RTCx->DOW & RTC_DOW_MASK);
00416         case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFMONTH:
00417                 return (RTCx->DOM & RTC_DOM_MASK);
00418         case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFYEAR:
00419                 return (RTCx->DOY & RTC_DOY_MASK);
00420         case RTC_TIMETYPE_MONTH:
00421                 return (RTCx->MONTH & RTC_MONTH_MASK);
00422         case RTC_TIMETYPE_YEAR:
00423                 return (RTCx->YEAR & RTC_YEAR_MASK);
00424         default:
00425                 return (0);
00426         }
00427 }

00437 void RTC_SetFullTime (LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, RTC_TIME_Type *pFullTime)
00438 {
00439         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00440 
00441         RTCx->DOM = pFullTime->DOM & RTC_DOM_MASK;
00442         RTCx->DOW = pFullTime->DOW & RTC_DOW_MASK;
00443         RTCx->DOY = pFullTime->DOY & RTC_DOY_MASK;
00444         RTCx->HOUR = pFullTime->HOUR & RTC_HOUR_MASK;
00445         RTCx->MIN = pFullTime->MIN & RTC_MIN_MASK;
00446         RTCx->SEC = pFullTime->SEC & RTC_SEC_MASK;
00447         RTCx->MONTH = pFullTime->MONTH & RTC_MONTH_MASK;
00448         RTCx->YEAR = pFullTime->YEAR & RTC_YEAR_MASK;
00449 }

00474 /*********************************************************************/
00489 void RTC_SetAlarmTime (LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, uint32_t Timetype, uint32_t ALValue)
00490 {
00491         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00492 
00493         switch (Timetype)
00494         {
00495         case RTC_TIMETYPE_SECOND:
00496                 CHECK_PARAM(ALValue <= RTC_SECOND_MAX);
00497 
00498                 RTCx->ALSEC = ALValue & RTC_SEC_MASK;
00499                 break;
00500 
00501         case RTC_TIMETYPE_MINUTE:
00502                 CHECK_PARAM(ALValue <= RTC_MINUTE_MAX);
00503 
00504                 RTCx->ALMIN = ALValue & RTC_MIN_MASK;
00505                 break;
00506 
00507         case RTC_TIMETYPE_HOUR:
00508                 CHECK_PARAM(ALValue <= RTC_HOUR_MAX);
00509 
00510                 RTCx->ALHOUR = ALValue & RTC_HOUR_MASK;
00511                 break;
00512 
00513         case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFWEEK:
00514                 CHECK_PARAM(ALValue <= RTC_DAYOFWEEK_MAX);
00515 
00516                 RTCx->ALDOW = ALValue & RTC_DOW_MASK;
00517                 break;
00518 
00519         case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFMONTH:
00520                 CHECK_PARAM((ALValue <= RTC_DAYOFMONTH_MAX) \
00521                                 && (ALValue >= RTC_DAYOFMONTH_MIN));
00522 
00523                 RTCx->ALDOM = ALValue & RTC_DOM_MASK;
00524                 break;
00525 
00526         case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFYEAR:
00527                 CHECK_PARAM((ALValue >= RTC_DAYOFYEAR_MIN) \
00528                                 && (ALValue <= RTC_DAYOFYEAR_MAX));
00529 
00530                 RTCx->ALDOY = ALValue & RTC_DOY_MASK;
00531                 break;
00532 
00533         case RTC_TIMETYPE_MONTH:
00534                 CHECK_PARAM((ALValue >= RTC_MONTH_MIN) \
00535                                 && (ALValue <= RTC_MONTH_MAX));
00536 
00537                 RTCx->ALMON = ALValue & RTC_MONTH_MASK;
00538                 break;
00539 
00540         case RTC_TIMETYPE_YEAR:
00541                 CHECK_PARAM(ALValue <= RTC_YEAR_MAX);
00542 
00543                 RTCx->ALYEAR = ALValue & RTC_YEAR_MASK;
00544                 break;
00545         }
00546 }

00550 /*********************************************************************/
00564 uint32_t RTC_GetAlarmTime (LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, uint32_t Timetype)
00565 {
00566         switch (Timetype)
00567         {
00568         case RTC_TIMETYPE_SECOND:
00569                 return (RTCx->ALSEC & RTC_SEC_MASK);
00570         case RTC_TIMETYPE_MINUTE:
00571                 return (RTCx->ALMIN & RTC_MIN_MASK);
00572         case RTC_TIMETYPE_HOUR:
00573                 return (RTCx->ALHOUR & RTC_HOUR_MASK);
00574         case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFWEEK:
00575                 return (RTCx->ALDOW & RTC_DOW_MASK);
00576         case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFMONTH:
00577                 return (RTCx->ALDOM & RTC_DOM_MASK);
00578         case RTC_TIMETYPE_DAYOFYEAR:
00579                 return (RTCx->ALDOY & RTC_DOY_MASK);
00580         case RTC_TIMETYPE_MONTH:
00581                 return (RTCx->ALMON & RTC_MONTH_MASK);
00582         case RTC_TIMETYPE_YEAR:
00583                 return (RTCx->ALYEAR & RTC_YEAR_MASK);
00584         default:
00585                 return (0);
00586         }
00587 }

00597 void RTC_SetFullAlarmTime (LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, RTC_TIME_Type *pFullTime)
00598 {
00599         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00600 
00601         RTCx->ALDOM = pFullTime->DOM & RTC_DOM_MASK;
00602         RTCx->ALDOW = pFullTime->DOW & RTC_DOW_MASK;
00603         RTCx->ALDOY = pFullTime->DOY & RTC_DOY_MASK;
00604         RTCx->ALHOUR = pFullTime->HOUR & RTC_HOUR_MASK;
00605         RTCx->ALMIN = pFullTime->MIN & RTC_MIN_MASK;
00606         RTCx->ALSEC = pFullTime->SEC & RTC_SEC_MASK;
00607         RTCx->ALMON = pFullTime->MONTH & RTC_MONTH_MASK;
00608         RTCx->ALYEAR = pFullTime->YEAR & RTC_YEAR_MASK;
00609 }

00620 {

00622

00626         pFullTime->HOUR = RTCx->ALHOUR & RTC_HOUR_MASK;
00627         pFullTime->MIN = RTCx->ALMIN & RTC_MIN_MASK;
00628         pFullTime->SEC = RTCx->ALSEC & RTC_SEC_MASK;
00629         pFullTime->MONTH = RTCx->ALMON & RTC_MONTH_MASK;
00630         pFullTime->YEAR = RTCx->ALYEAR & RTC_YEAR_MASK;

00634 /*********************************************************************/
00646 IntStatus RTC_GetIntPending (LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, uint32_t IntType)
00647 {
00648         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00649         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTC_INT(IntType));
00650 
00651         return ((RTCx->ILR & IntType) ? SET : RESET);
00652 }
00653 
00654 
00655 /*********************************************************************/
00665 void RTC_ClearIntPending (LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, uint32_t IntType)
00666 {
00667         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00668         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTC_INT(IntType));
00669 
00670         RTCx->ILR |= IntType;
00671 }

00673 /*********************************************************************/
00681 void RTC_CalibCounterCmd(LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, FunctionalState NewState)
00682 {
00683         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00684         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
00685 
00686         if (NewState == ENABLE)
00687         {
00688                 RTCx->CCR &= (~RTC_CCR_CCALEN) & RTC_CCR_BITMASK;
00689         }
00690         else
00691         {
00692                 RTCx->CCR |= RTC_CCR_CCALEN;
00693         }
00694 }
00695 
00696 
00697 /*********************************************************************/
00707 void RTC_CalibConfig(LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, uint32_t CalibValue, uint8_t CalibDir)
00708 {
00709         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00710         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTC_CALIB_DIR(CalibDir));
00711         CHECK_PARAM(CalibValue < RTC_CALIBRATION_MAX);
00712 
00713         RTCx->CALIBRATION = ((CalibValue - 1) & RTC_CALIBRATION_CALVAL_MASK) \
00714                         | ((CalibDir == RTC_CALIB_DIR_BACKWARD) ? RTC_CALIBRATION_LIBDIR : 0);
00715 }

00718 /*********************************************************************/
00729 void RTC_WriteGPREG (LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, uint8_t Channel, uint32_t Value)
00730 {
00731         uint32_t *preg;
00732 
00733         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00734         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTC_GPREG_CH(Channel));
00735 
00736         preg = (uint32_t *)&RTCx->GPREG0;
00737         preg += Channel;
00738         *preg = Value;
00739 }
00740 
00741 
00742 /*********************************************************************/
00752 uint32_t RTC_ReadGPREG (LPC_RTC_TypeDef *RTCx, uint8_t Channel)
00753 {
00754         uint32_t *preg;
00755         uint32_t value;
00756 
00757         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTCx(RTCx));
00758         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_RTC_GPREG_CH(Channel));
00759 
00760         preg = (uint32_t *)&RTCx->GPREG0;
00761         preg += Channel;
00762         value = *preg;
00763         return (value);
00764 }
